holidays.title: National Hug Your Dog Day
holidays.description: Not only does a good squeeze strengthen your bond, it shows your pet that you care.

holidays.title: National Siblings Day
holidays.description: Siblings are our best friends and sometimes our worst enemies.

holidays.title: Birth anniversary of Manlilikha ng Bayan Masino Intaray
holidays.description: Masino Intaray’s talent was a treasure to his community and his country.

holidays.title: Dyngus Day
holidays.description: Indulge your adventurous traits and treat yourself to a nice holiday this Dyngus Day.

holidays.title: Easter Monday
holidays.description: There are different and interesting traditions surrounding the Monday that comes immediately after Easter Day.

holidays.title: Global Work From Home Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the freedom that comes with working from home.

holidays.title: Golfer’s Day
holidays.description: Read on and learn everything you need to know about Golfer’s Day.

holidays.title: International Safety Pin Day
holidays.description: Let us get ready to celebrate the versatile and invaluable safety pin!

holidays.title: National Calvin Day
holidays.description: If you are a Calvin, today we are making the day memorable just for you.

holidays.title: National Cinnamon Crescent Day
holidays.description: If you love a sweet breakfast, you will enjoy cinnamon crescents for breakfast.

holidays.title: National Encourage a Young Writer Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about the history of writing and how to encourage young writers.

holidays.title: National Farm Animals Day
holidays.description: Taking care of our farm animals ensures their well-being as well as ours.

holidays.title: National Nana Day
holidays.description: There is something special about the name Nana — let’s find out more about it!

holidays.title: National Report IRS Tax Fraud Day
holidays.description: National Report IRS Tax Fraud Day persuades people to report tax fraud and earn rewards.

holidays.title: National Tamara Day
holidays.description: The name Tamara has an interesting history, let’s explore it on this their special day.

holidays.title: National Youth HIV and AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: Prepare to learn about and help raise awareness about these potentially fatal diseases!

holidays.title: Orthodox Easter Monday
holidays.description: It's another day to rejoice, celebrate the resurrection of Christ, and find some Easter eggs.

holidays.title: Salvation Army Founder's Day
holidays.description: Follow in William Booth’s footsteps and join efforts to help those in need without discrimination.

holidays.title: White House Easter Egg Roll
holidays.description: Pick a color and get ready to roll at the White House Easter Egg Roll.

holidays.title: World Homeopathy Day
holidays.description: Prepare to take on conventional medicine by learning about alternative and complementary medicine!

holidays.title: Charlie Hunnam’s Birthday
holidays.description: Charlie Hunnam is landing roles and stealing hearts — we’re celebrating this handsome talent today!

holidays.title: Custis Blue’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok star, influencer, singer, and actor is testimony to what hard work can achieve

holidays.title: Emily Miller’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s cheers to this upcoming professional British model and reality T.V. star!

holidays.title: Shay Mitchell’s Birthday
holidays.description: She had many dreams for herself, and she fulfilled every one of them!

holidays.title: Sofia Carson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world is a playground and an oyster for this actress and singer.

holidays.title: Ynw Bslime’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this super young but very talented rapper, nothing can stop him!
